The result was that gas accumulated in the mine exploded after it came into contact with an open flame , taking the precious lives of twenty - four miners .
On November 5 , power suddenly went out in the Jiaojiazhai Coal Mine of Shanxi Xuangang Coal Power Company , resulting in a gas accumulation in the shaft of an intake airway .
In breach of regulations , somebody had turned on the power switch without evacuation of the workers , resulting in a tragedy in which forty - seven miners lost their lives .
Time and again , this frightful risk - taking mentality has opened a " Pandora 's box " of major accidents .
The severe situation of frequent and serious coal mine accidents since the arrival of winter once again illustrates that absolutely no risk - taking mentality can be allowed .

All state functionaries , enterprise leaders and staff whose work are related to safe production must firmly establish the production concept of " safety first " and build a strong ideological defense line for preventing accidents .
On December 9 , The " Taipei - Kaohsiung " elections came to an end .
According to the rules , seven candidates who were defeated will have their election security deposits forfeited because the number of votes they gained failed to exceed the " threshold . "

Meanwhile , KMT candidate for Kaohsiung mayor Huang Chun - ying , who lost by a slim margin , believed that the vote counting on the 9th was seriously flawed and will file a complaint of invalid election , asking Kaohsiung District Court to preserve evidences and demanding that all ballots , voter registers , election , vote counting reports and other data throughout the city be sealed .
It is because the difference between the two parties is only a bit over 1,000 ballots , and 6,622 invalid ballots in the elections were related with the support for Huang Chun - ying .
Following an overnight review , Kaohsiung District Court decided on the early morning of the 10th that they were allowed to be sealed .
Seven candidates ' security deposits are forfeited
According to the relevant rules in Taiwan , seven candidates in the Taipei and Kaohsiung mayoral elections this time will have their security deposits completely forfeited .
Reports said that a total of 2,008,434 people voted in the Taipei mayoral election this time .

According to the rules , candidates must get one - tenth of the vote , that is , 200,843 votes , before they can be refunded the security deposit of NT$ 2 million they submitted when they registered for the election .
People 's Net , Macau , December 14 , reported by correspondent Zeng Kun :

Jia Qinglin , Standing Committee Member of CPC Central Committee Political Bureau , Chairman of CPPCC National Committee and Chairman of the China Council for Promoting Peaceful Reunification , sent a letter congratulating the convening of a conference today in Macau , which was held by the Worldwide Overseas Chinese for Promoting Peaceful Reunification of China .

In the congratulatory letter , Jia Qinglin expressed his high respect and sincere gratitude to all the Hong Kong and Macau compatriots , Taiwan compatriots , and other overseas Chinese who have contributed toward China 's cause of peaceful reunification .
He said that the realization of complete reunification of the motherland is the common aspiration of the Chinese people at home and abroad .
The promotion of the peaceful development of cross-strait relations conforms to the common interests and expectations of compatriots on both sides of the Taiwan Strait .
Presently , there are more than 170 associations or similar organizations established in over 80 countries and regions that aim to promote the peaceful reunification of China .

They have played an important and positive role in opposing the arrogant separatist forces of " Taiwan Independence " , in strengthening the international community 's recognition of the one - China principle , and in uniting the efforts of Chinese worldwide to form the most widespread united front against " independence " and promote reunification and to jointly promote the cause of the peaceful reunification of China .
Xinhua News Agency , Paris , December 15 -LRB- Reporter Lu Suyan -RRB- :
In 2006 , satellite - managed agriculture has rapidly gained popularity in France .

The French Land Information Company recently announced that there are now over 10 thousand users of its " Star of the Earth " satellite management system in the whole country , covering a planting area of over 260,000 acres .
The " Star of the Earth " satellite management system is specially designed for the French authorities to manage the agricultural industry through satellites .

Through images taken at an altitude of 870 kilometers by the SPOT Earth Observation Satellite , it can analyze the chlorophyll content and conditions of leaves and branches , and would in turn monitor the growth of crops .
Specialists from the Institute of Agriculture will then integrate factors such as meteorological data and earth conditions before providing agricultural managerial suggestions to producers .
According to the report , the " Star of the Earth " system has been in early use since 2002 , but there have been few clients .

Following the establishment of the French Land Information Company in January of this year , users need to pay only 10 Euros for each acre of land every year , and the company will timely provide to them detailed field management guiding suggestions and charts .
Statistics have shown that the " Star of the Earth " system has effectively avoided the excessive use of fertilizers and pesticides .
Xinhua News Agency , Cairo , Nov. 24 -LRB- Correspondents Guo Chunju and Lin Jianyang -RRB-

Moussa , secretary - general of the League of Arab States -LRB- the Arab League -RRB- , made a statement on the 24th , condemning the series of car bomb attack incidents that occurred in Sadr City east of the Iraqi capital of Baghdad on the 23rd .
He called for a meeting of foreign ministers of the Arab League to discuss the situation in Iraq .

In his statement Moussa gave a warning to those who were attempting to escalate the sectarian conflicts in Iraq , urging all factions in Iraq to jointly confront these violent acts and thwart their attempts to sabotage Iraq 's unity and stability .
Moussa said that the religious and political leaders of Iraq should take on responsibility when their country is faced with such an urgent crisis .
On the afternoon of the 23rd , a market and three squares in Sadr City were attacked in succession by car bombs and mortar fire , leaving about 200 people dead and 250 wounded .
This is the attack with most casualties since the Iraq war broke out in 2003 .
As its residents are mostly Shiite Muslims , Sadr City is considered the stronghold of the " Mahdi Army , " a militia led by Shiite cleric Sadr .
Analysts believes that the attack event may likely again intensify the sectarian conflicts , turning Iraq into further turmoil .
This morning in the southern Sudanese city of Wau , a grand decoration ceremony was held in the camp of Chinese peacekeeping troops belonging to the UN Mission in the Sudan -LRB- UNMIS -RRB- .
The 435 Chinese peacekeeping soldiers currently carrying out peacekeeping duties in Sudan were each awarded the UN Peace Medal of Honor .
UNMIS Commander Lieutenant General Lidder and UNMIS Sector II Commanding Officer Colonel Donau personally placed the medals on the chests of the Chinese peacekeeping officers and soldiers .
The Chinese peacekeeping workers and soldiers also gave the guests a huge martial - arts performance .

The ceremony was attended by a total of more than five hundred people , including UNMIS officers , representatives from foreign military peacekeeping forces , officers and soldiers of the peacekeeping force , military observers and civil police representatives .

Since being deployed in May this year , the first group of peacekeeping troops to Sudan , composed of the Jinan Military Region of the Chinese People 's Liberation Army , have overcome all kinds of difficulties that ordinary people would find hard to imagine .

They have completed with great success the construction of the camp area infrastructure , the building of roads in the sector , maintenance on Wau Airport , safeguarding of material transport , medical and first aid services , as well as other duties .

They won high praise from UNMIS officials and unanimous commendation from foreign peacekeeping troops , and fully revealed the Chinese force 's excellent image as a mighty force , a civilized force and a peaceful force .
This peacekeeping operation is the longest continuous operation of UN peacekeeping operations since China participated .
The mission term is six and a half years .

After the 16th Party Congress explicitly spelled out the theory of developing and constructing cultural industry , the cultural industry of our country developed rapidly , and a series of cultural markets gradually came into being .

According to incomplete statistics , the actual income for our country 's broadcasting , film , and television has reached a record of 81.854 billion Yuan in 2005 , 13.335 billion Yuan more than that in 2004 , an increase of 19.46 % .
The current condition of the cultural industry can be summed up in three key phrases -- turnover , growth rate , and industry workers .
It has even altered the fortunes of remote provinces such as Yunnan and Sichuan .
China News Agency , Taipei , December 11 -LRB- Reporters Xu Changan and Geng Jun -RRB-

Outgoing Taipei mayor Ma Ying - jeou officiated on the 11th evening the opening of this year 's Christmas celebration - " Christmas 2006 in Taipei " - by lighting up lights at the city 's dance plaza next to the Taipei City Government .
At the lighting - up ceremony that night , Ma Ying - jeou wore a red Christmas hat and , together with other invited guests , activated the start button .

Amid the flashing lights , a six - meter - tall Christmas tree with gold and white Christmas balls and other dazzling decorations of colorful flowers stood by the side while lights lit up one layer after another like a shooting star through the sky until they reached all the way to the large star at the top of the tree .
This is Ma Ying - jeou 's last Christmas in Taipei as mayor of the city .

Ma Ying - jeou noted that during the past eight years , each time he participated in the caroling activities during the Christmas season - whether he was in Wanhua District or Tienmu , the night markets of Shihlin , the Shinyee business district , or other streets within the city - he deeply felt the citizens ' enthusiastic support and hopes for the city government .
This year is his last participation in Christmas activities while still in office .

The city government will continue the main theme of " reconciliation , love , and Christmas Eve , " and invite citizens , new immigrants , seniors , and other groups to join in , hoping that it will bring warmth and love to everyone , as well as infuse society with love and brightness .
Those who leaped up to express doubts after the Italian won the Golden Ball Award of the European Footballer of the Year continue to keep raising questions .
Indeed , for Cannavaro , after the World Cup , his second half of the year in the Spanish first division competition was an absolute disaster .
His play with Real Madrid was extremely unstable and on several occasions his stupid mistakes led to the team 's loss of the game .
It did n't look at all like the performance of an European Footballer of the Year .
But people familiar with the selection of the European Footballer of the Year know that what the FIFA award puts the most emphasis on is the scores in FIFA - organized competitions .
This is why once a World Cup year rolls around , the award winner is sure to be a key player from the World Cup champion team .
Among the new Italian World Cup champion team , the midfield and forward players were unconvincing , so Cannavaro was naturally the most suitable choice .

The fact that Ronaldinho could be selected as European Footballer of the Year last year was to a large degree owing to his outstanding performance in another major competition organized by FIFA -- the Confederations Cup .

The State Production Safety Supervision and Management Office announced today that , since December , four serious water seepage accidents have occurred successively within national coal mines , resulting in 22 deaths .

According to the Safety Supervision Office 's briefing , on December 1 , at 19:55 , a water seepage accident occurred at a coal mine in Tea Station , Jing Yang Zhen , Jun Lian county , Yibin City , in Sichuan Province , in which four people were killed .
On December 7 at 7:30 , a water seepage accident occurred at Ping'an Coal Mine in Fuxin City , in Liaoning Province , killing 8 people .
On December 12 at 18:10 , a water seepage accident took place in Fusheng Coal Mine in Boli county , Qitaihe City , in Heilongjiang Province , killing 6 people .
On December 14 at 18:40 , a water seepage accident occurred at Yungang Mine of Datong Coal Mine Group Co. , Ltd. , in Shanxi Province , killing 4 people .

In addition , on December 16 at 5:15 , a flooding accident took place in Lincheng Coal Mine of Jingjing Bureau of Mines and Jinneng Group , in Hebei province , in which the entire coal mine pit was flooded .
According to news from Bogota , Columbia and the US today signed a free - trade pact .
But it is still not clear whether the trade agreement will be approved by the currently - Democratic - controlled US Congress .

Although US Democrats do n't oppose the free - trade pact , some of the party 's leaders have previously said they want to add more content relating to labor and environmental restrictions to treaties reached with other countries .
The initialing of the free trade pact between the two countries took place at the headquarters of the Inter-American Development Bank .
It can then become valid once approved by the two countries ' congresses .
The US trade representative and Columbian minister of trade , industry and tourism signed the treaty .

Regarding the difficulties that would occur when the free trade pact was handed over to the new US Congress , Columbian President Uribe said that it was " necessary " that Congress pass this trade agreement .
Many investors are placing their hopes on the free trade pact because it is the final agreement that would assure long - term entry into the US market .
Xinhua News Agency WASHINGTON , Nov. 30 -LRB- Reporters Li Xuejun and Zhao Yi -RRB-

US State Department Deputy Spokesman Casey emphasized at a press conference on the 30th that the statement regarding US - British relations made a few days earlier by Kendall Myers , an official with the US State Department 's Bureau of Intelligence and Research , was mistaken and did not reflect the position of the US government .
At the same time , Casey also spoke in defense of the " special relationship " between the US and the UK .
He said that US - Anglo relations were very unique and that if the US - Anglo relationship did not exist , the world would be worse off .

According to reports by US media , Myers said during a speech at John - Hopkins University in Washington that relations between Britain and the US were " completely a one - sided relationship " and that Britain 's role as a bridge between the US and Europe was " currently disappearing before our eyes " .
He pointed out that although Britain attempts to influence US foreign policy , the US " had closed its eyes " to it .
Through 25 years of development , Xiamen Special Economic Zone has evolved from the previously isolated coastal defense outpost to a frontline of reform and opening - up .
The beauty of Xiamen today lies in its harmony .

While its total production output has grown at an annual average of 18 % for 25 years , Xiamen has also won the title of " National Civilized City " and the " UN Habitat Scroll of Honor Award , " being honored as " the nicest city " and " the best city in which to live . "
Xiamen needs modernization , but wants to avoid " modern malaise . "
This is the consensus that the Xiamen Municipal Party Committee and the city government reached at the beginning of construction of the special economic zone .

For 25 years , Xiamen has always upheld the concept of " stressing both development and preservation , with the economy and the environment both as winners , " seeking harmonious development of humanity and nature .

Today , total city - wide industrial output has increased more than 200 fold from before the special economic zone was constructed , but overall environmental quality has basically maintained its original level .
The Portuguese media reported on the 23rd that 108 Portuguese armed police left the capital of Lisbon to fly to East Timor to carry out peace - keeping operations on the evening of 22nd .
This is another group of peace - keeping armed police sent to East Timor by the Portuguese government .
The first group of 17 peace - keeping armed police arrived in East Timor on October 15 .

Jose Magalhaes , an official of Portuguese Home Affairs , told local media that the armed police troops were dispatched to East Timor at the request of the United Nations and the East Timorese government .
These police have received special training , and among them , some have work experience in East Timor .
Their major responsibilities are to train the East Timorese police and preserve local social order .
It is not difficult to shout out the slogan of " public transport first , " nor is it difficult to write down " public transport first " on paper .
At present the cost of building a subway is 300 - 500 million yuan per kilometer .

But based on the experience of Hangzhou City , the cost of 28 kilometers of high - speed surface public transport is only 200 million yuan in total , less than the construction costs of one kilometer of subway .
From the perspective of construction cycle , a city constructs no more than 3 - 5 kilometers of rail lines in a year .
Building a rail network of several hundred kilometers requires many decades .
Xinhua News Agency , Kiev , Dec. 20 -LRB- Correspondent Chen Chang -RRB-
At a Police Day rally held in Kiev on the 20th , Ukrainian President Yushchenko urged to step up the crackdown on corruption in financial sectors so as to ensure the national economic security .

According to a report by the National News Agency of Ukraine , Yushchenko said in his speech at the rally that Ukraine is currently facing a very grim situation in combating corruption , which is especially demonstrated in the financial sector .
In his opinion , many banks in Ukraine have been on the verge of bankruptcy in recent years .
Yushchenko especially emphasized the increasingly rampant corruption and crime in the allocation and use of land in recent years .
The issue of corruption has been a persistent problem for many years in Ukrainian society , causing great dissatisfaction among the vast majority of people .
According to reports by the Ukrainian media , the corruption of officials at various levels will cause a loss as big as 1.8 billion US dollars in Ukraine 's fiscal revenues in 2006 .

The Export - Import Banks of China and the United States made a joint announcement in Beijing on the 14th that the negotiations regarding the standard form of medium - term credit agreement between the Chinese borrower and the American lender have been successfully completed .
According to the information , this milestone standard agreement form will provide financing for projects of under 20 million US dollars in amount to further promote the increase of US exports .
The Ministry of Finance of China will provide guarantee for these loans , while the Export - Import Bank of the United States will provide medium - term export credit guarantee for the loans .
This standard agreement form pre-negotiated by the two sides of the borrower and the lender will benefit both China and the US .
US exporters and Chinese importers will both find a substantial reduction in the time for negotiating an agreement on the relevant financing sector in their transactions .
Australian astrophysicist Rodney Marks mysteriously died in Antarctica in 2000 .
Since this may be the first recorded murder case that has occurred in Antarctica , New Zealand police are continuing to open the investigation of the case .
The New Zealand police claimed that 32 - year - old Rodney died at the " Scott - Amundsen Sea Antarctic Research Station " probably because someone intentionally killed him by poison .
Preliminary autopsy results show that Rodney died from methanol poisoning .
Recent progress in investigations of the case discovered that Rodney loved drinking , and often used alcohol to control his Tourette syndrome , an inherited neurological disorder .
Methanol is a fuel for internal combustion engine .

Police authorities had believed once that Rodney might have died from suicide , but such possibility was quickly ruled out , because the decedent was building an intimate relationship with a woman before he died .

After six years of investigation , the New Zealand police have recently re-summoned the coroner for questions because no confirmed evidence has been found so far to prove how the " murderer " " got " the methanol into the decedent 's body .
For six years , Wu Xiangming has wandered without end between being guilty and not guilty .
A court of first instance has twice declared him guilty and an intermediate court has twice issued final judgments declaring him not guilty .

At the beginning of December , the Intermediate People 's Court of Yuncheng , Shanxi Province again transferred Wu Xiangming 's case file , indicating that the case was about to enter the review process .
Once again , a " seesaw struggle " between two levels of courts was about to unfold .
-LRB- << Democracy and Legal Times >> Dec. 11 -RRB-

The case , it can be said , brings together a lot of the defects of China 's judiciary , such as the lack of the " principle on prohibiting double jeopardy , " the difficulty in getting compensation from the state , and the detrimental practice the political and law committees have of coordinating cases .

Also we have seen the notice given by the Hejin Political and Law Committee to the Intermediate Court of Yucheng : The political and law committee speaking on behalf of the court and procuratorate of Hejin in regard to the appeal for compensation by Wu Xiangming , " We will not and it 's impossible for us to accept it . "

The United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America and the Caribbean -LRB- simplified as ECLAC -RRB- with its headquarters in Santiago issued a bulletin on the 14th , noting that the economic growth rate of Latin America and the Caribbean regions will reach 5.3 % in 2006 , but the economic growth rate of this area would slow down to 4.7 % in 2007 .

According to the bulletin , the annual economic growth rate in Latin America and the Caribbean regions stood at an average of 2.2 % per year between 1980 and 2002 ; thereafter , the region witnessed four consecutive years of relatively rapid growth .
Nevertheless , as compared to other developing countries and regions , economic growth in Latin America and the Caribbean regions is still considerably slow .

ECLAC believed that the favorable global environment boosted total exports from the countries in Latin America and the Caribbean regions to increase by 8.4 % this year , and this was one of the factors that spurred economic growth in the region .
The Commission believes that the international environment of next year will remain conducive to economic development in this region .
On December 9 , Princess Masako , wife of the Japanese Crown Prince , celebrated her 43rd birthday .

Before this , she recalled in writing some of her thoughts in the past year , mentioning things such as attending daughter Princess Aiko 's sports meet and taking and picking up her daughter to and from school , and adding that she " was very happy " about these activities .
According to Japanese media reports on December 9 , apart from expressing the joys of rearing her daughter , Masako also recalled her experience of visiting some children 's facilities .
Of course , she also had a deep impression about the days when she previously visited the Netherlands with the Prince and little Princess Aiko together .

During the time of Masako 's birthday , and citing the opinion of the medical team , the Japan Intrauterine Office noted that Princess Masako has been very attentive and involved in Princess Aiko 's childcare activities in the nursery , and this has been extremely beneficial to her physical and mental health .
The medical team pointed out that Princess Masako is in the process of gradually expanding her scope of activities , and this has been very significant and also very helpful for her treatment .
But at the same time , the medical team noted that it is necessary for Masako to continue receiving her treatment .
Staff of the Eastern Palace also revealed that Masako is currently receiving medicinal treatment .
According to a report in the Washington Post on the 20th , during an interview by the newspaper on the 19th , US President Bush acknowledged for the first time that the US had n't won the Iraq War .
But he said at the same time that the US was also not losing the war .
The report said that the position taken by Bush on this occasion regarding the Iraq War issue was in sharp contrast to his previous statements .
Prior to the mid-term congressional elections held in early November of this year , Bush had also clearly stated that the US " is absolutely winning " the Iraq War .
Bush also confirmed during the interview that he is considering temporarily sending more troops to Iraq , but he did n't disclose a specific number .
According to the report , the White House is considering sending an additional 15,000 to 30,000 troops to Iraq to be possibly stationed there for a period of about six to eight months .
Bush also indicated that he plans to expand the size of the US military .
He has instructed the newly appointed Defense Secretary Gates to propose a plan for an increase in the number of personnel in the Army and the Marine Corps .
Xinhua News Agency LOS ANGELES , Dec. 15 -LRB- Reporter Gao Yuan -RRB-
According to a report by the American television network Fox , a rare storm which is tearing across several western US states on the 15th has caused the deaths of at least four people .
The report said the storm left more than 1.5 million homes and businesses in Washington state and Oregon state without power , and many homes are without heat .
Near the city of Olympia in Oregon , a young man was crushed in his sleep by a large tree blown over by the powerful wind .
A 41 - year - old woman in Seattle drowned in the basement of her home .
Two other people died in traffic accidents caused by trees blown down by the powerful wind .
The storm also caused power outage in one of the terminals at the Seattle - Tacoma Airport .
Amtrak cancelled trains operating between Portland and Seattle .
The US National Weather Service says that rainfall in the Oregon coastal areas could reach as much as 203 mm .
Xinhua News Agency TOKYO , Dec. 13 -LRB- Reporter Liu Haoyuan -RRB-
A report issued by the Cabinet Office of Japan on the 13th forecasts that the Japanese economy will continue to maintain growth momentum in the 2007 fiscal year .
After excluding the price variation factor , the real growth rate of the Japanese economy in the 2007 fiscal year will reach 2 % , making it the sixth year in a row that growth has been maintained .
The report by the Cabinet Office says that in the 2007 fiscal year , Japan will see growth in its average aggregate price and will completely shake off deflation .
Prior to this , the Japanese government forecasted that commodity price in the 2006 fiscal year would enter a period in which the nominal growth rate would surpass the real growth rate .
This indicates that the government had already lost confidence in shaking off deflation in the 2006 fiscal year .
The reports says that with the gradual rise in employment and personal income , Japanese household expenditure will show growth .
After entering the 2007 fiscal year , the Japanese economy , pulled along by good corporate results and led by domestic demand , will continue to look upbeat .

South Korea 's Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry confirmed on the 21st that the highly pathogenic avian flu epidemic - the fourth in the country this year - has recently been found in the city of Asan in Chungcheongnam - Do of South Korea .

South Korea 's Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry said this evening that an Asan City duck farm reported to the relevant department on the 11th that since the 5th of this month , the number of egg production of over 9,000 ducks in the duck farm had fallen sharply .

After tests conducted by the Korean National Academy of Veterinarian Science , it has been confirmed that there was indeed an outbreak of the highly pathogenic avian influenza virus on that duck farm .
Officials from the South Korean Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry said the duck farm also suffered from an avian flu epidemic in 2004 .
After being informed on the 11th , the South Korean Quarantine Department has taken measures to restrict the transportation of eggs from the farm , and has also started destroying the eggs .

Currently , the Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry and the local government of Chungcheongnam - Do had already sealed off and had restricted access to the four major roads surrounding the avian flu - infected duck farm .
They have also decided to slaughter over 22,000 domestic birds and poultry within a 3 - kilometer radius of the epidemic site in order to prevent further spread of the epidemic .
Tropical storm " UTOR " , No. 23 -LRB- UTOR -RRB- of this year -LRB- international number : 0622 -RRB- , developed over seas east of the Philippines on the morning of the 8th .
On the afternoon of the 9th , it strengthened into a typhoon and landed on a strip of coast in the central Philippines .
At daybreak this morning , " UTOR " entered the eastern part of the South China Sea .

At ten o'clock in the morning , its center was located approximately 740 km southeast of Woody Island of China 's Paracel Island group at 13.4 degrees north latitude and 118.2 degrees east longitude .
The maximum wind force near the center is level 12 -LRB- 35 m / s -RRB- .

It is estimated that the typhoon 's center will move in a northwest - by - west direction at a speed of 15 - 20 km per hour , gradually approaching near the territorial waters of the Paracel Islands .

Jointly influenced by " UTOR " and the cold air , from midday today until midday tomorrow , the Bashi Channel , the Balintang Channel , the Taiwan Strait , and most of the South China Sea will see a typhoon reaching Level 7 - 9 .
The wind - force in the south - central portion of the South China Sea could reach Level 10 - 12 .
Chinanews.com United Nations on December 15 .
In international diplomacy , French is still being listed as a necessary language .
France has demanded that candidates for the post of United Nations Secretary - General speak not only English , but also French .
Therefore , the first difficulty faced by Ban Ki - moon after he assumed office was that his French was not good enough .

Even though Ban Ki - moon had exerted some prior efforts in learning French , still during the first press conference after he was sworn in , when questioned for quite some time by a Canadian reporter in French , and after he heard out the question , Ban said with a tinge of embarrassment that if spoken slowly , he could handle French , but he definitely could not handle the reporter 's question .
By then it was apparent that his proficiency of French still needs to be strengthened .
However , Ban Ki - moon 's aide noted that after the press conference , Ban was also interviewed by the French media , where he answered two questions .
Ban Ki - moon answered both questions in French .
On October 24 , inside the New World Plaza in Beijing , cosmetic sales representatives were lingering in front of the SK - II counter , where iron fences were still standing .

Recently , the State Bureau of Quality and Technical Supervision and the Ministry of Public Health said in a joint statement that P&G Corporation had confirmed that chromium and neodymium were not added during the manufacturing process , and that chromium and neodymium found in the products were results of them being brought in from the ingredients .
P&G Corporation said they would continue to sell SK - II products in China .

Before this , the State Bureau of Quality and Technical Supervision announced on September 14 that the Entry and Exit Inspection and Quarantine Agencies had found chromium and neodymium in nine SK - II cosmetic products .
This had resulted in the wave of return of sub-standard SK - II products within China 's cosmetic market .
And later on September 22 , SK - II announced that they would temporarily cease their sales of products in China as well as the operation of SK - II counters .
Issued by China News Agency , photo by Liao Pan
Chinanews . com December 4 , by wire
According to a report from the Information Times , SK - II reopened its first counter in mainland China yesterday in Guang Bai Department Store in Guangzhou .
Guangzhou 's Municipal Committee member and Executive Deputy Mayor Ling Weixian officiated at the ribbon - cutting ceremony .
Until after their sales had ceased in mainland China for almost two months , sales of the complete range of SK - II products have now been resumed .
Xinhua News Agency , Beijing , December 19 -LRB- Reporter Li Wen -RRB-
More than 60 years ago , when the world 's first penicillin antibiotic was introduced , it was described as " the enemy of bacteria . "
But not long after men were intoxicated by their victory over nature , they came to the realization that " when the good advances by one step , its evil counterpart will advance by several steps . "
World Health Organization experts are now even worried that " a super all - drug - resistant new bacteria will bring human beings back to an era when infectious disease raged . "
There are two dangers in the excessive use of antibiotics : first , it " strengthens the enemy group . "
In 1928 , when the forefather of antibiotics - penicillin - was launched , it seemed invincible , but now , it is getting old and weak .
Now , even the top antibiotic brand vancomycin is also challenged by the new generation Staphylococcus aureus .
Right now , the United States has to spend two to four billion U.S. Dollars each year to fight the anti-drug bacteria .
Secondly , it " undermines the united front . "
Some of them may cause pseudomembranous colitis , which has a death rate as high as 20 % , while others may lead to dangerous septicemia .
Chinanews.com , Nov. 23 The CPC Central Committee recently expanded the exchange for provincial disciplinary committee secretaries .
As of now , disciplinary committee secretaries from six provinces have been transferred to different locales .

An article in today 's Hong Kong - based Wen Wei Pao noted that the Central Committee 's nation - wide redeployment of disciplinary committee secretaries helps reverse the ineffective situation of local disciplinary committees in combating corruption .
Recently , the Central Committee is carrying out the reshuffle of local party committees .

The article 's analysis said that currently the eight provinces of Guangdong , Zhejiang , Hubei , Anhui , Henan , Shanxi , Shandong , and Fujian have been involved in changes of disciplinary committee secretaries .

With the exception of Song Yuying , disciplinary committee secretary of Hubei Province , and Yang Chuansheng , disciplinary committee secretary of Shandong Province , who were transferred to positions at the same level within their own provinces , disciplinary committee secretaries of the other six provinces were transferred as exchanges among different locales .

According to news coming out of the International Academic Conference on Underground Space that closed a few days ago , newly built or rebuilt pedestrian crossing facilities within Beijing 's 2nd Ring Road will , from now on , primarily consist in the future of flat surface pedestrian crosswalks and underground street - crossing facilities .
We do n't know when pedestrian overpasses started to become popular in Chinese cities .
Even the capital city Beijing was unable to rise above the convention .
Various types of drawbacks have caused many pedestrian overpasses in Beijing to be in an unwelcome state and we believe a lot of people are deeply bothered .
Similar situations are likewise occurring in many cities and in recent years many cities have started to tear down pedestrian overpasses .
We must persist in putting the " Three Rural Issues " in a prominent position in the overall situation of economic and social development .
In recent years , the central government has adopted a series of valid policies to solve the " Three Rural Issues " .
But we must also understand that there still exist many problems in the work on the " Three Rurals " .
The Fourth Global Bird Flu Prevention and Control Conference is scheduled to be held in Mali , Africa , from December 6 - 8 .

Experts pointed out today that once the fatal high - pathogenic avian flu virus spreads to countries that are not preventively well - prepared , such as Africa and the Middle East countries , international donor agencies should increase their funding again by an extra one billion U.S. dollars so as to better assist these areas in preventive efforts .

United Nations bird flu coordinator Nabarro and World Bank economist Jonas noted that issues such as increasing donations and the need for funds would be discussed and resolved at the Fourth Global Bird Flu Prevention and Control Conference .

The two experts pointed out that apart from the fund of 1.9 billion U.S. dollars decided upon during the Third Global Bird Flu Prevention and Control Conference that was held in January in Beijing , it is estimated that in the next two to three years , funds that need to be set aside for preventive efforts ought to be increased by 986 million to 1.3 billion U.S. dollars .

In an annual foreign opinion poll conducted by the Japanese Cabinet , 34.3 % of Japanese feel friendly toward China , a slight increase of 1.9 % from the historically low proportion in the previous survey , and the first improvement in the past three years .

As for South Korea , 48.5 % of Japanese expressed friendly sentiments , which is a 2.6 % decline , a continual downward slide over three years , and the first time since the crisis seven years ago that the percentage has dipped to below the 50 % mark .
Announced by the Cabinet on the 9th , the foreign opinion poll was conducted between October 5th and 15th on 3,000 men and women aged 20 and above .
Among them , 1,704 responded , constituting a 56.8 % response rate .

The results of the survey indicated that although more Japanese feel friendly toward China , only 21.7 % of the respondents thought that relations between Japan and China were good , an increase of 2 % , whereas a majority of 70.7 % did not believe that the bilateral relations were good .
Taiwan 's " Health Department " today -LRB- 13th -RRB- announced its " 2003 Cancer Registry Report " .
Apart from carcinoma in situ where the rate of successful treatment is almost 100 % , the occurrence rate of cancer on the island is 250.77 people per 100,000 .
On average , a new cancer patient is added every 8.4 minutes .

According to a " Central News Agency " report , " Health Department " studied the newly detected individual cancer cases for the entire island 's 212 hospitals with the scale of more than 50 beds and revealed that an approximate occurrence rate of cancer on the island is 250.77 people per 100,000 in 2003 .
And the most frequent occurrence is at age of 65 for men and 60 for women .

Of these , the ten most frequent occurrences of cancer in men are in the following order : liver cancer , lung cancer , colon and rectal cancer , oral cancer , stomach cancer , prostate cancer , bladder cancer , esophageal cancer , nasopharyngeal cancer , and skin cancer .

For women , the ten most common cancers in order of occurrences are : breast cancer , colon and rectal cancer , liver cancer , lung cancer , uterine cervical cancer , stomach cancer , thyroid cancer , ovarian cancer , uterus cancer , and skin cancer .

During a telephone call on the evening of the 25th with Israeli Prime Minister Olmert , Abbas said the various Palestinian militant groups had agreed to stop firing missiles toward Israeli territory as of 6:00 at daybreak on the 26th .
He requested that the Israelis halt all military operations in the Gaza Strip and withdraw its troops from there .
Olmert expressed his acceptance of the request .
Shortly after the ceasefire agreement took effect , Palestinian militants fired three missiles from Gaza toward Sderot and other areas of Israel .
The missile attacks did not result in any Israeli casualties or property damage .

Olmert said on the 26th that although Palestinian militants in Gaza had carried out acts that day in breach of the ceasefire agreement , for the realization of the ceasefire Israel would still show " patience and control " .
On the morning of the 26th , Abbas ordered Palestinian security agency officials to uphold the Palestinian - Israeli ceasefire accord .

Therefore , text searches can reach the level of " when there is a question , let 's Baidu " , because text content on the Internet virtually covers all the information that we require on a daily basis .

But one point can be certain : marketing competition among search engines will become more intense , while community searches and video searches have become the new hot spots of the search engine industry .
2007 will be a decisive year of battle for the video search engines , and the outcome will soon become apparent .
The 2006 - 2007 " Fly in the Snow " Cup National Public Ski Series sponsored by the Skiing Association of China has opened today .
Presently , the National Public Ski Series is the largest , most highly - acclaimed and most widely covered competition in public skiing in our country .
After being successfully held four times , this competition will focus more on the public and ski amateurs .
Champions of the official events and championship contests will receive the title of " Ski King . "
Australia is facing the harshest drought in its history and Australian religious groups today held a nation - wide prayer for rain .

Crops and livestock on Australian farms have been greatly ravaged by the severe drought and Christian leaders in all regions of the country have joined forces with Australian farmers to pray together .
President of the Australian Catholic Bishops Conference Cardinal Wilson said , " We are praying wholeheartedly for rain and God will send us a blessing from heaven .
He said , " Farmers have suffered grievously from the drought , so we are joining the farmers in praying together for rain .

New South Wales Farmers Association President Laurie said that at a time when agricultural crops over a large swath of the country had been damaged , a rainfall would stimulate morale and the will to fight .
Laurie said he thought that the nation - wide prayer for rain would illustrate that urban residents are beginning to understand the impact of the drought in rural regions .
A survey by Nielsen Media Research , a US company , shows that nowadays Americans prefer to spend more time on TV .
The survey claims that the most popular spare time activity for Americans is watching TV .
It has become one of the important parts of life for ordinary Americans .
According to the survey forecast , in 2007 American people will spend more than 3,210 hours on surfing the Internet , watching TV , reading newspapers , and listening to music .
Among these , time spent watching TV ranks first is about 1,555 hours , an increase of some 100 hours from 2000 , with an average of 4.26 hours spent on watching TV per day .
According to statistics , American children spend approximately 15,000 hours watching TV , which is more than the time they spend in school .
Experts noted that watching TV for long hours may affect one 's mental and physical health and can easily lead to diseases such as insomnia , depression and obesity .
Therefore , an organization in Chicago has designated the last week of April in every year as " TV Turnoff Week , " urging Americans not to watch or watch less TV during this week .
At present this campaign has extended to the UK , Canada , Denmark , Australia and other countries .

Stanford University assistant professor of psychiatry and behavioral science Prof. Aboujaoude said , " In the past three or four years , we frequently have patients coming to our hospital for treatment , saying that the Internet has really negatively affected them .
He said , " At first , they tried to prove that their behavior was reasonable .

Online gambling and pornography web sites are now very popular , but Prof. Aboujaoude warned that internet obsession may stem from some very simple activities , such as checking one 's email once every five minutes , updating blogs , or logging in to finance web pages in order to check the fluctuations in stock prices
-LRB- China New Agency , Dec. 18 , Macau -RRB-

The Macau SAR Foreign Economic Relations Department announced on the 18th that in October this year Macau export producers had a monthly average of 2.66 months of orders - on - hand , compared with the last quarter 's 3.08 months and the year - on - year figure of 3.01 months .

In the third quarter of this year , the industry with the largest amount of export orders was the " garment industry " with 2.83 months , followed by the " footwear industry " and " other industries , " with .84 months and .95 months respectively in Macau .
The study issued by the Foreign Economic Relations Department showed that with regards to export markets , the US and EU markets are the best - performing markets , followed by Canada .

Other export markets , including other European countries , other Asia - Pacific regions , Middle - Eastern countries , African countries , Latin American counties , Australia and Japan , are not performing well .

Regarding the next three months , 65.7 % of export producers say that " foreign price competition " will still be the main problem that worries companies , while companies that say it will be " high raw material prices " and " staff shortages " constitute 59.6 % and 55.3 % respectively .
Recently , I could n't resist the temptation , and I followed fashion and invested several thousand yuan into getting a gas card from one of the big state companies .
The first time I used the gas card , I told the gas attendant to " put in one hundred . "
He put in the nozzle and filled it up to one hundred and seventy until I screamed out .
The first time could have been lack of experience , but the second time , and the third time were both the same .
I 'm a veteran driver with more than 10 years of experience , so I know that gas pumps can be preset .
It 's true that when I take out 100 yuan in cash , they would want to stop the nozzle at 99 yuan , but once you swipe a card -- must be a big customer ?!
See , I have again encountered this " value plus " gas purchase matter at two of the company 's Beijing gas stations within the recent nine days .

You see , it 's as if I were in a restaurant and I clearly ordered half a catty of steamed meat buns , but they squeezed a catty into my mouth , and then said , " Anyway , you have eaten your lunch and dinner all at once , so you just saved yourself some trouble . "

Li Rongrong , chairman of the State - owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council , said this morning that the sales revenues from the core businesses of the central state - owned enterprises reached 8 trillion yuan this year .
The realized profits are expected to exceed 720 billion yuan , and the net capital returns could reach 10.5 % .

At the press conference , Li Rongrong gave a detailed introduction of outlooks like the progress of supervision and management of the state - owned assets as well as the status of reforms and developments in central enterprises .

According to statistics , from January to November this year , the sales revenues of central enterprises reached 7.2984 trillion yuan , increased by 21.8 % year - on - year ; the realized profits reached 688.77 billion yuan , increased by 18.9 % year - on - year ; and the tax revenues reached 614.65 billion yuan , increased by 23.5 % year - on - year .

The whole annual sales revenues are expected to reach 8 trillion yuan ; the realized profits can reach 720 billion yuan ; taxes paid -LRB- including special petroleum gain levy -RRB- are expected to reach 700 billion yuan ; and the total assets can reach 12.2 trillion yuan .

Former Japanese Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi has said farewell to the number 1 treasured seat in Japanese political circles , but many people are still interested in various stories during his administration .

In a few days , Isao Iijima , who formerly served as secretary to the prime minister in the Koizumi cabinet , will publish a book entitled " Secret Records of the Prime Minister 's Official Residence under Koizumi , " revealing some little - known inside stories in the Koizumi cabinet .
According to Japanese media reports , this book will be published by Nihon Keizai Shimbun Inc. on December 12 .

As Koizumi 's secretary , Iijima in his book stressed the leadership ability of Koizumi during his five and half years of administration and talked about many secret stories in Japanese political circles , including that of Koizumi once giving North Korean leader Kim Jong - il a letter in his own handwriting before he visited North Korea in 2002 .
The book reveals that in mid-August 2002 , prior to his visit to North Korea , Koizumi sent a letter in his own handwriting to Kim Jong - il .

The letter said that Japan would seriously promote the normalization of diplomatic relations between the two countries , resolve the issue of compensation for North Korea , and work hard to improve the status of North Koreans living in Japan .

As a result , it also hoped that North Korea could sincerely deal with some bilateral issues between Japan and North Korea such as the abduction of Japanese hostages , the development of nuclear weapons and missiles , among others .
It was said that Koizumi started his trip to North Korea at that time only after he got the " affirmative reply " from North Korea .
Xinhua News Agency , Kuala Lumpur , Nov. 24 -LRB- Correspondents Gong Bin and Xiong Ping -RRB-
Though the 9th FESPIC Games do not officially open until the 25th , competition has already started on the 24th , and the Chinese team achieved victories in the day 's three matches .
The first match of the day for the Chinese team was also the first event of these Games .
The Chinese men 's wheelchair basketball team were playing New Caledonia .
In the end China won 103 - 26 .
China also won in another match that night playing Palestine .
The score was 99 - 20 .
The day 's other match for the Chinese team was a women 's blind goalball match .
China beat Iran 11 - 1 .

According to the briefing by Ma Litao , deputy director of the Competition Department of the China Disabled Persons ' Federation , the Chinese players were a little inhibited when the matches started on the first day of competition , but with the guidance of the coaches they very quickly adapted to the atmosphere .

After a recent visit to China , representatives of Namibia 's industry and business community said that China 's thriving market and enormous business potential , coupled with its rapid technological development and the rigorous and pragmatic style of its people , are attributes that they can learn from , and that their visit to China had been an " eye - opening " experience .

Earlier this month , together with President Pohamba , more than 20 Namibian businessmen , including Tarah Shaanika , who is in charge of the Namibia Federation of Industry and Commerce , attended the China - Africa Cooperation Forum Summit held in Beijing , and made contact with various Chinese enterprises .

In an interview with the local paper " Namibian " this week , Shaanika noted that in the area of economic development , there is a lot that Namibia could learn from China , especially in advanced technology and in its rigorous working style .
Shaanika said China and Namibia can cooperate in various fields such as in the manufacturing of motor vehicles , pesticides , and fertilizers .
The Summit meeting in Beijing shows to the whole world that China is serious about her relations with Africa , and is not trying to take by art and plunder by force Africa

According to a China 's First Financial Daily report , NDRC Vice Chairman Bi Jingquan said yesterday at a national meeting of the heads of price control administrations , " Next year we must continue to make great efforts and strive to ease the contradictions such as expensive schooling , expensive healthcare and expensive housing prices . "

Bi Jingquan said that next year they will standardize education fees , working with relevant departments to seriously comply with the requirement of controlling the scale of enrollment of non-registered students paying to attend public high schools of their choice to less than 30 % .
-LRB- Chinanews.com , Dec. 22 , by wire -RRB-

Recently , in light of increasingly serious network infiltrations by hackers , the US Defense Department and its subordinate agencies have taken actions one after the other to carefully detect hacker infiltration .
Last month , the College of Naval Warfare in Newport , Rhode Island immediately shut down the college 's network after indications of a hacker infiltration were discovered .
Now , it is the turn of the US National Defense University .
According to reports , the computer network system of the National Defense University has been completely shut down and a comprehensive search is underway for traces of a hacker infiltration .
On the surface , the situations at the National Defense University and the College of Naval Warfare differed somewhat and prior to them no suspicious indications had been found .
The one - month shutdown of the network is for the so - called " maintenance " .
But some analysts say that the National Defense University 's network was indeed infiltrated by hackers , although no concrete evidence has been found so far .
The US has agencies that specialize in developing infiltration tools and that are specifically responsible for researching hackers .
The computer of the National Defense University holds a large amount of important data .
Xinhua News Agency , Cairo , November 30 , -LRB- Reporters Guo Chunju and Lin Jianyang -RRB- -

A delegation organized by 33 well - known Chinese universities hosted a " China Education Exhibition " at Cairo University on the 30th to promote higher education in China and attract more international students to study in China .

The head of the Chinese college delegation , deputy secretary general of the China National Overseas Fund Committee , Li Jianmin , said in his speech that along with the development of Sino - Egyptian relations , the friendship between the two countries has continuously deepened and enhanced cooperation in areas like politics , economics , education , and so on .
This exhibition will help the Egyptian public to further understand the history of China 's development in its cause of education .

Chinese Ambassador to Egypt embassy Charge d'affaires and Minister Counselor Li Chen said that some well - known Chinese universities have maintained good cooperative relations with their Egyptian counterparts .
Many universities in Egypt have even started Chinese majors .
He welcomed more Egyptians to visit China and to understand Chinese culture .

Many Egyptian students who attended the exhibition obtained brochures from booths set up by Peking University , Fudan University , Beijing University of Science and Engineering , and others , as well as inquired about the details of those schools .

It is reported that this " China Education Exhibition " also held a publicity campaign on the 29th at Suez Canal University in Ismailia Province , 120 kilometers northeast of Cairo , where the turnout was said to be overwhelming .

On the evening of December 6 , about 5,000 South Korean farmers , workers and members of social groups held a large - scale " guerilla - style " demonstration in Seoul against negotiations currently underway in the US on a US - South Korean free - trade agreement .

The afternoon of the 6th , the Headquarters of the All - People Movement for Checking the South Korea - U.S FTA -LRB- simplified as the " All - People Headquarters " -RRB- held its third national assembly in Jangchung Park in Seoul 's Jongno District .
More than 5,000 South Korean workers , farmers and others participated in the assembly .

After the assembly concluded , contingents of demonstrators occupied traffic lanes in various locations of the city center to carry out demonstration marches , causing evening rush - hour traffic to become seriously congested .

In the resolution adopted at the assembly , the All - People Headquarters states : " -LRB- South Korean - US FTA negotiations -RRB- constitute an unfair consultation process that only benefits the US . "

Crowds of demonstrators of hundreds or up to more than a thousand people staged " guerrilla - type demonstrations " in Namdaemun , Chungmuro , Euljiro , Toegyero and Jongno and other locations respectively .

-LRB- Chinanewscom , UN , Nov. 27 , by wire -RRB- On the eve of his departure from his post , UN Secretary General Annan said today that in light of the present situation , Iraq can almost be regarded as having sunk into a state of civil war .

" In my opinion , in light of the development of the situation in Iraq , unless drastic measures are immediately taken to prevent further deterioration of the situation , Iraq will slide into civil war .
In fact , Iraq has almost sunk into a state of civil war already . " Annan told reporters the same day .
The same day , the US National Broadcasting Corporation -LRB- NBC -RRB- also stated during a news program that Iraq had already slid into civil war .

Analysts here have pointed out that Annan 's conclusion and the US media report will put more pressure on the US government , which has consistently refused to acknowledge that Iraq is sliding into civil war .
Calls from within the US for the withdrawal of troops from Iraq will also surge all the more .
On the 29th and 30th of this month , US President Bush will meet Iraqi Prime Minister Maliki in the capital of Jordan Amman to discuss the increasingly deteriorating situation in Iraq .

The certificate signing ceremony signifying China 's handing over of agricultural equipment to Kyrgyzstan took place on the 11th in Bishkek , marking the smooth completion of China 's assistance project on agricultural machinery to Kyrgyzstan .
Kyrgyzstan President Bakiyev and Prime Minister Kulov attended the signing ceremony .
In his speech , President Bakiyev said that the agricultural equipment assistance project had been the largest since Kyrgyzstan 's independence .
The quality of China 's agricultural equipment is good and has obtained acknowledgement from both experts and users .
He expressed his appreciation for China 's assistance .
He also noted that present relations between Kyrgyzstan and China are developing at a high level , and that the mutual cooperation has been fruitful and beneficial to both countries .
He believed that the continued strengthening of relationships of the two countries would benefit the peoples of both countries .

Chinese ambassador to Kyrgyzstan Zhang Yannian said that China had successfully completed this assistance project in merely five months - an indication of the high level of cooperation between the related departments of both Kyrgyzstan and China .
Anhui Province is considering expanding the rates of uptake of housing provident funds .

At the same time , people who have migrated to cities for work , individual urban business owners and the self - employed will be allowed to apply to contribute to housing provident funds , and the base salary reference for the monthly contribution is to be calculated according to the contributor 's average monthly taxed income from the previous year .
-LRB- Nov. 6 , " Anhui Business News " -RRB-
Urban residents with no jobs are not eligible for them .
Xinhua News Agency BEIJING , Dec. 5 -LRB- Peng Ting -RRB-
The fifth is the International Volunteer Day .
The Volunteer Team of the Beijing Narcotics Control Association has officially been established and has begun a full - scale recruitment of drug control volunteers .

Liu Jie , the head of the Volunteer Team of the Beijing Narcotics Control Association , said that the work of drug control volunteers includes disseminating knowledge on drug prevention , therapy and counseling for drug addicts , participation in drug - related studies and so on .
For the first time , volunteers will be permitted to participate in work on drug - related studies .
Otherwise , all citizens who have reached the age of eighteen , possess political rights and are willing to volunteerily join the team can submit an application .
Foreigners in Beijing and former addicts who have broken their drug habit are also qualified to become drug prevention volunteers .
It is estimated that by the Spring Festival of 2007 , Beijing could recruit up to 5000 drug - control volunteers .
The drawing of teams for the 2007 Asian Cup Finals was announced in Kuala Lumpur on the evening of the 19th .
China was placed in team C and will compete against Iran , Uzbekistan , and Malaysia for one of two seats in the quarterfinals .
This Asian Cup is jointly organized by Indonesia , Malaysia , Thailand , and Vietnam , and the teams from these four countries will directly enter the finals .
Listed as seeded teams are Australia , Iran , Japan , and South Korea .

The drawing results for the other three teams are : Team A - Thailand , Australia , Oman , and Iraq ; Team B - Vietnam , Japan , Qatar , the United Arab Emirates ; and Team D - Indonesia , South Korea , Saudi Arabia , and Bahrain .

According to the schedule provided by the Asian Football Confederation , the opening match of the 14th Asian Cup Finals will be held between Thailand and Iraq on July 7 next year , and the finals will be held in Jakarta on July 29 .
The Chinese team will compete against the Malaysian team in the first round on July 10 , the Iranian team on the 15th , and the Uzbekistan team on the 18th .

At the drawing ceremony held in Kuala Lumpur 's Convention Center on that evening , the Asian Football Confederation also invited Chinese soccer veteran Fan Zhiyi , who was also known as Mr. Asian Football , Japanese soccer star Hidetoshi Nakata , as well as Iranian player Aziz and others as special guests .
Well - known performers from the four sponsor countries also entertained guests with their splendid songs and dance performances .

In the wake of the revelation that Australia 's wheat marketing company , AWB , paid bribes to former Iraqi President Hussein , the massive company has been forced to split in order to save the company 's wheat monopoly business .
The AWB company Chairman Stewart said that he deeply regretted the action by the company .
Stewart said that the scandal not only seriously damaged the company 's reputation , and had a detrimental effect on the massive business and the government , but also damaged Australia 's image .
AWB was severely hit after the relevant inquiry report into the matter was made public on the 27th .
The inquiry report explains in detail how , in order to win wheat contracts , AWB paid the Iraqi dictator USD 220 million in kickbacks between 1999 and 2003 when Hussein fell from power .
Australian Prime Minister Howard said the government could cancel AWB 's monopoly in the wheat business next week .
The company has monopolized Australian wheat exports for as long as sixty - seven years .

The latest study by the China Central Party School 's working group on " Analysis and Forecast of Social Trends in China " says that for the first time " law and order " has become the most serious social problem in the eyes of leading cadres .

The study says that leading cadres said that the most serious problems existing in our country 's social development in 2006 were , in order of priority : law and order -LRB- 36.6 % -RRB- ; the income gap between citizens -LRB- 23.2 % -RRB- ; and corruption -LRB- 8.0 % -RRB- .

The China Central Party School 's working group on " Analysis and Forecast of Social Trends in China " has already conducted the questionnaire targeting leading party cadres and students for eight years .
It is only in recent years that " corruption " , " unemployment " and " law and order " have begun to gradually climb each year in the order of precedence .
The " Chinese Cultural Festival " currently underway in Japan will last one month , giving the Japanese people a vivid demonstration of the charm of Chinese culture and art .
Both Chinese and Japanese people from all walks of life were overjoyed and excited by the success of the opening concert .
Ambassador Wang Yi said that this cultural festival took nearly a year to prepare and that the opening ceremony received enormously warm responses in Japan .
Premier Wen Jiabao and Japanese Prime Minister Abe especially sent messages of congratulation .

Her Highness Princess Takamado , member of the Japanese Imperial Household , took a special trip to attend the ceremony ; speakers of both the Senate and the House of Representatives came in person to celebrate the event ; and more than 70 members of both the Senate and the Houses of Representatives found time in their busy schedules to come ; just name a few highlights .
The cultural festival , being held at a time when the deadlock in Sino - Japanese relations has finally broken and a new hope is on the horizon again , has indeed arrived at the right time .

Just as Premier Wen said in his congratulatory message , the Chinese Cultural Festival will become the prelude to the joint celebration by the two nations of the 35th anniversary of the normalization of the Sino - Japanese diplomatic relations in 2007 .
A study recently released by American researchers shows that if early - stage breast cancer survivors intentionally reduce their fat intake , they may lower their risk of recurrence of the disease .
Researchers at the University of California , USA , randomly divided 2,437 early - stage breast cancer women patients into Group A and Group B .
The researchers gave people in Group A regular lessons about reducing fat intake , requiring them to record their daily fat intake so as to make them conscientiously reduce their fat intake .
Yet the researchers did not make any special request to women in Group B.

However , five years later , because people in Group A conscientiously reduced their fat intake , their average individual weight was six pounds -LRB- about 2.72 kg -RRB- less than that of people in Group B .

After conducting follow - up comparison of the conditions of these patients , the researchers found that the rate of breast cancer recurrence for people in Group A was 24 % lower than that of the people in Group B .

The UN Secretary General Annan issued a statement on the 22nd , welcoming the peace accord signed between the Nepalese government and anti-government militants and promising the UN would provide the Nepalese government aid as quickly as possible .

The statement said that the peace accord signed on the 21st between Nepal 's seven - party coalition government and anti-government militants will end armed conflict and give the Nepalese people hope for the establishment of lasting peace and democracy .

Annan said the peace accord requires the UN to provide help in all levels of the peace process , including immediately taking steps to control arms and the movements of militants within Nepal 's border , as well as providing assistance for elections .
For this reason , the peace accord implies trust as far as the UN is concerned .
The mayoral elections in Taipei and Kaohsiung have come to an end .

For the issues of the future moves and standing of the " four kings " of DPP , commentator Lu Li noted in an article published in Hong Kong 's Ta Kung Pao , that the positions of the " four kings " have already begun to undergo changes after the elections .
Frank Hsieh is the DPP 's " election king " in rebounding the party 's popularity .
With the Kaohsiung victory , Annette Lu and Su Tseng - chang emerged as the two most prominent casualties .

Before the elections , they were anxious to emerge as the " kings " seen as " politically detached " from Chen Shui - bian ; but after the polls when Chen Shui - bian 's status was consolidated , they faced the possibility of being " cut " by Chen at any time .
While as for Yu Shyi - kun , because of his achievements in supporting Chen , it is certain that he will be adequately compensated .
According to the article , the Taipei and Kaohsiung mayoral elections were won by the DPP by a narrow margin of over 1,000 votes .
This allowed the party to recapture Kaohsiung , and allowed Chen Shui - bian to retain his eminent position of " presidency . "
Frank Hsieh , whom Chen Shui - bian abandoned in Taipei to wage a lonely battle , received a surprising 41 % of the votes in Taipei .
This will lead to the re-alignment of succession plans and power structures within the DPP .

According to a " Financial Times " report on the 24th , some British officers headed by Chancellor of the Exchequer Gordon Brown are trying to boost environmental protection by actively promoting partial tax rate adjustments , as well as increasing taxation of certain high fuel - consumption modes of travel such as airplanes and four - wheeled vehicles .
According to the report , " green taxes " have come under constant controversy and speculation in Britain this year .
Treasury Department officials have previously proposed raising the line of taxes on certain new cars .

Some media here are predicting that the British government will increase the environmental protection tax next year , adding that specific measures might include raising the highway tax and aviation fuel tax , as well as levying special taxes on appliances that consume excessive resources .

The price of vegetables in the kingdom 's markets suddenly rose twofold or more this week .
Greengrocers attributed the rise in price to exports to Gulf states in order to achieve doubled and quick profits , in addition to the start of the Hajj season .
Al - Riyadh 's tour of the market to discover the reasons for this found a 36,000 Riyal deficit .
Attiyatulla Salim , a greengrocer in the northern market for greengrocery , complained of the price increase of vegetables by a number of farm owners and traders .
The price of a large box of zucchini is now between 100 and 120 Riyals whereas the price of a box of zucchini in the past was no more than 45 Riyals .
He pointed out his customers ' annoyance at the price rise , which happened a week ago and which has had a great effect on customers visiting the fruit and vegetable market .

Salim said that he had suffered a shortfall of 36,000 Riyals in the course of just one week as a result of the lack of customers buying vegetables following the price increase , in addition to having to pay out 100 Riyals in daily wages to five Saudi workers and 100 to foreign workers who carry the goods and are employed by the company which manages the market .

Today will be the announcement of the first five female elected university students , who will form the first student council to represent female students through student elections .

These are considered the first of their kind in Saudi universities and were initiated by Prince Mohamed Bin Fahd University through the department responsible for student activity in the female student department in the university .

The winning female students won after they had gone through a competition of 16 nominated female students , based on the percentages they received in elections to represent their female student colleagues in the council .
It will be run in a totally separate and independent way from what occurs in the female student university campus and will convey their desires to the faculty council and the university council .

Mona Al Nakhilan , Public Relations Manager in the Female Student Department , said that the experiment , which is considered the first of its kind in Saudi universities , represents an opportunity for university female students to express their opinions and shape their characters , noting that the elections took the acknowledged form of general elections and that the elected female student could deliver her opinions and convey her colleagues ' ideas to the university administration in the framework of religion and acknowledged traditions .

She noted that , after the return from Eid Al Adha vacation , each elected female student will present her own official plan and every nominated female student from among the 16 female nominees experienced for over two weeks , the period of the election phases , an election atmosphere for the first time .
The university administration in the Female Student Department was able to vote for the candidates through female employees among the female faculty members and female administrative employees .

The Special Force for Road Safety in the Qusaim district , Um Sedra Center , was able to arrest a Saudi person and another person of Arab nationality , after the second had smuggled a very large quantity of prohibited amphetamine pills , numbering more than 397 thousand pills inside his Mercedes car at exactly three in the morning , thinking that the early hour would help him go past the road guards on his way to Riyadh .

The details of the case , after the arrest of the first person in whose possession were ten pills of the same kind that were seized , are that while there was no relation or connection between the two arrested men , the car was going back and forth between the Kingdom and his country , which made the road guards suspicious of a concealed matter .
Accordingly , the 1997 Mercedes vehicle was searched .
Plastic bags were found in the front and back doors , numbering 397 bags , each containing a thousand pills .
Immediately after they were seized , the arrested men were handed over directly to the Drug Combating Department .

Iraqi police sources said today , Monday , that a group of gunmen , whose members were wearing security forces uniforms and driving official cars , were able to steal one million US dollars in downtown Baghdad .

And a security source told the independent news agency Voices of Iraq that " Three new pick - up trucks , similar to the vehicles of the Iraqi security forces , driven by around 20 gunmen wearing National Guard uniforms , blocked two cars in Al - Sadoon street in downtown Baghdad . "
He added that " The two cars carried four employees of the Middle East Investment Bank who were carrying one million dollars . "
And he indicated that " The two cars were on their way to deposit the sum at the Iraqi Central Bank on Al - Rashid street in downtown Baghdad . "
And the source revealed that the gunmen " kidnapped the employees , took the million dollars , and the two cars and escaped to an unknown destination . "
And he said that " The employees work at the Al - Alawiyah branch of the Middle East Investment Bank , and it is a national bank . "
It is worth mentioning that Sadoon street , where the incident occurred , is in the center of the capital , Baghdad , and is considered one of the most important commercial streets of the city .
The street always has heavy traffic activity and has a number of Iraqi security forces checkpoints on it .
And what makes the security measures on Al - Sadoon street even more intense is Baghdad Hotel which is one of the important hotels in Baghdad .
It is located at the middle of Al - Sadoon street and has intensified security measures , such that it is surrounded by concrete walls , barbed wire , and dozens of security men .
Recently , Baghdad city witnessed two similar incidents .

One of them targeted one of the governmental Rafidain banks in Al - Amiriyah district in western Baghdad , when gunmen wearing Iraqi security forces uniforms again broke into the bank and stole the money that was there .

In 1955 , U.S. cartoon magnate Walt Disney set up the first modern style amusement park in California , moving in one by one all the vivid animated characters from his films .

In this amusement park , named after Disney himself , not only could children play with life - sized cartoon figures , they could also drive futurized cars , ride in Mississippi - style paddle steamers , lose themselves in medieval castles , or take a stroll through the streets of America .
From then on , Disneyland became the promised land dreamed about by countless kids all over the world , influencing generation after generation of little and not - so - little kids .
After more than half a century , Disneyland 's fame and appeal continues to grow , creating astonishing wealth for the Disney group .
Theme parks account for forty percent of Disney 's annual revenue .

I feel that for many years there have been problems with the work orientation of the Earthquake Administration .
Many experts at the Earthquake Administration all put their minds to work on how to forecast earthquakes , but it is very difficult to make great progress in a short time in this work .
Therefore , it is necessary for the Earthquake Administration to focus their work on how to prepare against earthquakes .
Japan is an earthquake - prone country , where earthquake experts do a great deal of earthquake simulation and modeling , simulating various kinds of circumstances when earthquakes occur .

For example , they postulate that a 7.0 magnitude or stronger earthquake occurring in the Tokyo city center will result in derailed subways , with tens of thousands of people trapped underground , while the large embankment of a river in the north called Arakawa will collapse , causing water to flood into the subterraneous streets .
When this sort of the worst situation occurs , 100,000 people would die in Tokyo .

There are many similar simulations , and many cities such as Nagoya and Osaka have all their own earthquake disaster simulations and have made contingency plans against earthquakes based on these simulations .

Mr. Cao , who is 60 years old this year , simply could n't withstand this " gentle offensive " of his and became the first " builder of illegal buildings to pay his own expenses of tearing down an illegal building " in the city .
